history.possible_exposure_para: It's possible you may have crossed paths with someone diagnosed with COVID-19
history.what_does_this_mean_para:
Based on your GPS history, it is possible that you may have been in contact with or close to somebody who was diagnosed with COVID-19. This does not mean you are infected but that you might be.

For further information on what you should do you can refer to the Mayo Clinic’s website.
history.what_if_no_symptoms: What if I’m not showing symptoms?
history.what_if_no_symptoms_para:
Consult your local or national public health authority for recommended next steps. 

Individuals who don't exhibit symptoms can sometimes still carry the infection and infect others. Being careful about social distancing and coming in contact with large groups or at risk individuals (the elderly, those with significant other medical issues) is important to manage both your risk and the risk to others.

import.error: There was a problem importing your data. Please try again

google.already_imported: Your Google location history has already been imported.
google.disclaimer: Safe Paths has no affiliation with Google and never shares your data with them.
google.file_open_error:
Your file could not be opened. 
Locate the file in Google Drive and please try again.
google.instructions_detailed:
Go to Google Takeout to export your Location History.
1. In Select data to include, select only your “Location History” and click Next Step
2. Use the following settings:
     - Delivery method: "Add to Drive" 
     - Frequency: "Export once" 
     - File type & size: ".zip" and "1GB"
3. Google will send an email when the export is complete
5. Return to this screen in Safe Paths to import that file from Google Drive
google.instructions_first: Add your past location data from Google to start building your recent location history.
google.instructions_second: First, export (or "take out") your location data from Google.
google.invalid_file_format:
Provided file format is not supported. 
Supported formats: ".zip".
google.no_recent_locations: Google Takeout doesn't have any recent locations to export.
google.title: Google Maps

import.subtitle: To see if you may have crossed paths someone diagnosed with COVID-19 prior to downloading Safe Paths, you can import your personal location history from Google.
import.success: Your recent locations were successfully imported!
import.title: Import your Locations

label.authorities_desc:
Follow your local and/or national public health authorities for trusted information on COVID-19 in your area. 

Through Safe Paths, they can share resources and publish verified, anonymous data to let you know if you may have crossed paths with someone diagnosed with COVID-19. 

Don’t have a local health authority available right now? Don’t worry, we’ll let you know if they are added in the future.
label.authorities_new_in_area_msg: We found {{count}} new health authority in your area. Follow them for trusted information on COVID-19 near you
label.authorities_new_in_area_msg_plural: We found {{count}} new health authorities in your area. Follow them for trusted information on COVID-19 near you.
label.authorities_new_subcription_msg: You’re following {{count}} new health authority in your area for trusted information on COVID-19 near you.
label.authorities_new_subcription_msg_plural: You’re following {{count}} new health authorities in your area for trusted information on COVID-19 near you
label.authorities_removal_alert_desc: Are you sure you want to remove this health authority?
label.choose_provider_subtitle: Stay informed with trusted information on COVID-19 in your area.
label.commitment_para: Safe Paths securely records and compares your location(s) to other people's anonymous location data. Your data will NEVER leave your phone without your consent.
label.event_history_subtitle: Learn when you may have crossed paths with someone diagnosed with COVID-19 based on trusted data from your local health authorities.
label.home_at_risk_subsubtext: This does not mean you are infected.
label.home_at_risk_subtext: Based on your GPS history, you may have crossed paths with someone diagnosed with COVID-19.
label.home_no_contact_subtext: Based on available data, you haven’t crossed paths with anyone diagnosed with COVID-19.
label.home_setting_off_subtext: We can’t tell if you’re at risk unless you enable location history in the settings screen.
label.home_unknown_subtext: We can’t tell if you’re at risk unless you enable the app to access your location.
label.launch_authority_header: Healthcare Authorities will provide your device with the local data to know if you have crossed paths with an infected person
label.launch_authority_subheader: Automatically subscribe to receive the latest updates from Healthcare Authorities in your area.
label.launch_done_subheader: You’re ready to roll. Remember, you can always update your preferences later.
label.launch_location_header: To remember where you go, your phone needs to save your location.
label.launch_location_subheader: Don’t worry, information never leaves your device unless you explicitly decide to share.
label.launch_notif_header: Get notified if you cross paths with someone diagnosed with COVID-19.
label.launch_notif_subheader: We won't bother you except to share updates on your potential exposure risks.
label.launch_screen1_header: The way back to normal starts here.
label.launch_screen2_header: Get notified if you cross paths with someone later diagnosed with COVID-19.
label.launch_screen3_header: If you test positive, you can choose to donate your data anonymously
label.launch_screen3_subheader: Which helps keep your entire community safe.
label.launch_screen4_header: You're in complete control. Data is only saved on your phone.
label.launch_screen4_subheader: If you test positive, you alone can choose whether to share.
label.location_disabled_message: COVID Safe Paths requires location services.
label.location_enabled_message: COVID Safe Paths is securely storing your GPS coordinates once every five minutes on this device.
label.news_subtitle: Find the latest COVID updates from your local health authority and Safe Paths.
label.push_at_risk_message: Based on your location history, you may have crossed paths with someone diagnosed with COVID-19.
label.team_para: Our team is composed of a consortium of epidemiologists, engineers, data scientists, digital privacy evangelists, professors and researchers from reputable institutions, including: MIT, Harvard, The Mayo Clinic, TripleBlind, EyeNetra, Ernst & Young and Link Ventures.

share.paragraph_first: If you test positive for COVID-19, help keep your community safe by anonymously sharing your location history with local health authorities.
share.paragraph_second: Your location data is shared as a simple list of times and places, with no additional information included.
share.subtitle: Your private data can be transferred to health authorities, backed up, or otherwise shared.
share.title: Share location history

version_update.push_notification_message: Please update to the latest version.
